column1: Southern Star was a variety of pipe-weed grown in the Southfarthing of the Shire
column2: and apparently originating in the district around Longbottom. The star of its name presumably refers to the star-shaped flowers of the pipe-weed plant.

column1: In the second (out of seven) drafts of The Lord of the Rings Prologue
2007: The Lord of the Rings Online:
:The smoke from Southern Star Pipe-weed takes the form of two smoke rings that pass through each other as they float out from the pipe.
